name: Main Banner
description: Image, text overlay that links user to a category using the markup editor

attribute_definition_groups.name: Banner Image
attribute_definition_groups.description: The visual display of the banner image in the background.

attribute_definition_groups.name: Title
attribute_definition_groups.description: The title on top of the banner image.

attribute_definition_groups.name: Short Description
attribute_definition_groups.description: The short description text at the bottom of the banner image.

attribute_definition_groups.name: Call To Action
attribute_definition_groups.description: The CTA link on the banner image
